channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- VMware Tanzu Application Service for VMs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- VMware Tanzu Application Service for VMs

item.title: CVE-2023-20891|2024-10-21T13:07:34.980Z -- vmware -- vmware%20tanzu%20application%20service%20for%20vms
item.description: The VMware Tanzu Application Service for VMs and Isolation Segment contain an information disclosure vulnerability due to the logging of credentials in hex encoding in platform system audit logs.Â A malicious non-admin user who has access to the platform system audit logs can access hex encoded CF API admin credentials and can push new malicious versions of an application. In a default deployment non-admin users do not have access to the platform system audit logs.
